SELECT R.REPORT_NO, P.TITLE, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_DATE, R.PROCESSING_DATE, R.REPORT_TARGET_NO FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON R.REPORT_TARGET_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO WHERE REPORT_TYPE = 1
AND TO_CHAR(R.REPORT_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REPORT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY
R.REPORT_NO
P.TITLE
P.CONTENT
PROCESSING_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R WHERE REPORT_TYPE = 1
AND TO_CHAR(R.REPORT_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND REPORT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
